Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDelta
Variable.Comment: Range of tolerance on the input for active probe control

Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDT
Variable.Comment: Active probe disconnection alarm delay time

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: SafeModeDT
Variable.Comment: Delay time to wait before to enter in safe mode in milliseconds

Variable.Name: PrbOff
Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: UpdThrsh
Variable.Comment: Minimum variation to make the slave notify the change to the master (only for AIn)

Variable.Name: EnSafeMode
Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze output, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: OfflinePattern
Variable.Comment: Pattern in case of offline if EnSafeMode=TRUE

Variable.Name: ActPrbAlrmDT
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Active probe alarm delay time

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinDelta
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum variation to get during MinPeriod to avoid to trigger active probe alarm

Variable.Name: ActPrbMinPeriod
Variable.Comment: [Only in case of active probe AIn] Minimum period in which probe value must change at least of MinDelta, otherwise active probe alarm is triggered

Variable.Comment: Probe offset to adjust readed values (only for AIn)

Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is on (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Comment: Delay in ms in which out is off (for types 2 and 3)

Variable.Comment: Safe mode enabling (FALSE=freeze outputs, TRUE=execute pattern)

Variable.Name: ValIn
Variable.Comment: Values to be sent to cpCOe. Only outputs are considered.

Variable.Name: ValOut
Variable.Comment: Values coming from cpCOe. Only inputs are considered. Outputs take the same values of ValsIn. In case of block disabled, all inputs are set to 0 or FALSE.
